column2: "Na David nye apem apem do na ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo
column3: mekyerɛ mbapɔmba no nyinara kɔr egyina."

column2: "Na David see Israel bagua no nyinara dɛ
column4: na sɛ ofir EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn hɔ a
column5: hom mma yentwar mu nsoma ma wɔnkɔ hɛn nuanom a wɔaka wɔ Israel asaase nyinara do beebiara
column6: nye asɔfo na Levifo a wɔka hɔn ho wɔ hɔn edzidzibea nkurow mu no nkyɛn
column7: ma wonhyiahyia hɔnho mbra hɛn nkyɛn:"

column2: "na yɛnkɛfa hɛn Nyankopɔn N'adakaa no mbra hɛn nkyɛn bio: osiandɛ Saul ne nda mu no yɛannhwehwɛ n'ekyir kwan."
"Na bagua no nyinara see dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛm: osiandɛ asɛm no tsen wɔ ɔman no nyinara enyi do."
"Nna David poon Israel man mu nyinara hyiae
column3: ofi Egypt ɔwora Sihor ho araa dze kodu Hamat ahɛnee
column4: dɛ wɔrekɛfa Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no efi Kiriat-jearim aba."

column2: "Na David na Israel nyinara fowee kɔr Baala
column3: ɔno nye Kiriat-jearim a odzi wɔ Juda no
column5: EWURADZE a ɔtse kerubfo no do a wɔdze Dzin no frɛ no no

column2: "Na woyii Nyankopɔn adakaa no wɔ tseaseanam fofor bi do
column3: na wɔdze fii Abinadab fie firii: na Uza na Ahio piaa tseaseanam no."

column2: "Na David na Israel nyinara dze hɔn ahoɔdzen nyinara goree wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim: mekyerɛ wɔdze ndwom
"Na aber a wodur Kidon ewuporoweebea no
column3: Uza tseen ne nsa suoo adaka no mu; osiandɛ anantwi no fintsiwii."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ Uza do
column4: osiandɛ ɔtseen ne nsa kaa adaka no ntsi: na hɔ na owui wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column3: osiandɛ EWURADZE ebu afa Uza do ntsi: na ɔfrɛɛ bea no Perez-Uza

column4: Mibesi dɛn medze Nyankopɔn adakaa no aba me nkyɛn wɔ fie?"

column2: "Na David ennyi adaka no ammba ne nkyɛn wɔ David kurow no mu
column3: na mbom ɔdze maan nkyɛn kɔr Gitinyi Obed-edom n'ebusua mu wɔ ne fie abosoom ebiasa."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn adakaa no kaa Obed-edom n'ebusua mu wɔ ne fie abosoom ebiasa: na EWURADZE hyiraa Obed-edom fi
